Module slogo_team01
Package view.selector.features

Class ColorPicker

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.selector.features.ColorPicker
  • public class ColorPicker
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for storing the color palette for the front end. When the user asks the pen or background color to change colors, this class takes care of the index to color translation.
    Author:
    Ben lawrence

    • Constructor Detail

      • ColorPicker

        public ColorPicker()
        Constructor for the ColorPicker class. This constructor takes in no arguments as it does not depend on any other classes. The palette is read in from a file. If any colors are incorrectly coded, they are replaced with a default color.

    • Method Detail

      • getColorFromIndex

        public javafx.scene.paint.Color getColorFromIndex​(int index)
        Takes in an index and returns the JavaFX color associated with that index in the palette.
        Parameters:
        index - - Integer index of palette color.
        Returns:
        -Returns the color associated with the given index in the palette. If no color found, just returns the default color.

      • addNewColorIndex

        public void addNewColorIndex​(int index,
                             int r,
                             int g,
                             int b)
        Adds a new color with the given index to the palette. If the index already exists, changes the index to the new RGB color.
        Parameters:
        index - - Integer index of color being created/changed
        r - - Integer red value of color in range 0 - 255
        g - - Integer green value of color in range 0 - 255
        b - - Integer blue value of color in range 0 - 255
